name: Hardware Business
description:
Hardware Business is a casual  simulation game where you buy broken computer  hardware , repair and sell them on your store.

MARKET

The Market is a place where you buy broken computer hardware .

Every hardware have a broken percentage (the higher broken percentage is the higher the repair cost will be ) that will affect the repair cost . So buy wisely .

INVENTORY

The Inventory is the place where you repair and list your hardware for sale.

STORE

The Store is the place where customers will search for buying  the hardware they want. So make sure to list list your hardware for sale. 

DISCLAIMER

since this game is still in early phase of  development expect to see many change in the near future.

join our DISCORD to be part of this existing adventure.
